display_long_description:
The most popular and relaxing game in the Caribbean is now available in VR!

⛵️ The legendary island pastime HOOK & RING is now available in VR! Transform your living room into a tropical haven as you climb aboard your very own dinghy and set sail for your exclusive private island!


🌞 Escape the hustle and bustle of reality and immerse yourself in the calming ambiance of the Caribbean. Let the gentle waves and tropical breeze transport you to a world where relaxation is the only order of the day. Sharpen your aim with three different rings in Classic mode, test your destruction skills in the Angry Sailor bottle breaking mode, or fend off a hoard of zombies in Pirate Attack mode.

🌊 The magic of JB's Hook & Ring Hideaway is just a download away! Transport yourself to a world where every moment feels like a Caribbean vacation. It's always island time at JB’s!




🌴 3 Unique Rings

🌴 3 Game Modes: Classic, Angry Sailor, and Pirate Attack

🌴 A Variety of Tropical Tunes

🌴 Competitive Leaderboard
